trends: There have been no other sightings in pocomoke
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details I live in a two story farm house outside of Pocomoke City in a rural area with my wife,nieace,and three childern.My wife was at work, my nieace was outside with the dogs, and I was busy getting the kids ready for bed when my nieace ran inside and yelled for me to come downstairs and look outside.We both stood and watched as an enormus glowing red ball of light crossed the field in front of us and came to an instant stall overtop the treeline on the other side of the field. The object seemed to be almost oval in shape and was pulsating redish light. My dogs took off and darted across the field towards the object as it droped like a stone out of the sky.My nieace and I were both terrified, I told her to go inside with the childern. I grabbed a flashlight and reluctantly went to cross the field calling out for my dogs but before I reached the edge of the field they both came running back. I went inside and locked up the house. I told my wife about it when she came home, she wasn,t suprised because of somthing we both wittnesed not far from here a few years before.
Summary: seen above tree line behind house
